description:
George`s next opponent is Gentle Chapman. Like Michelo Chariot, Chapman is under the influence of Master Asia and the Devil Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bote der Finsternis! Chapman erhebt sich erneut
Emissary of Darkness! Chapman Rises Again
Jigoku kara no Shisha! Chapman Fukkatsu
Le messager de l’enfer ! Chapman est de retour
地獄からの使者! チャップマン復活
